channel.title: Sebpkscape
channel.description:
Sebpkscape great server come join our network on hamachi. Great server friendly Admins and Mods
~Rules~ No no cliping,you will get one warnig next time is ban. No summoning while pking auto bann. No rangeing from more than 1 space away from target 1 warning next time is ban. No ::setitem ### ### auto ban. No perfect rings you will be asked to give to admin 3 times if you dont its ban. No gaining up on 1 person while pking. DONOT ASK TO BECOME ADMIN OR MOD IF SEB AND I (JIPSY) THINK UR GOOD WE WILL PRMOTE YOU. NO TRADEING FIRECAPES FOR ITEM OR MONEY ON "RUNESCAPE" NO PKING WIHT INVISIBLE ON AUTO BAN
~Commands~ ::fire -Makes you on fire. ::fireoff -Turns you back to normal. ::starter -Gives you a starter kit.(only one time) ::yell (text) -tells everybody the text you put in. ::food -Gives you full invintory of manta rays. ::robes -Gives you all the mystic robes and ghostly robes. ::jad -Teles to mage arena. ::train -Teles to dummys. ::Pray -Teles to altar in varock. ::range -Teles to targets at range guilde. ::empty -Empties everything in invintory. ::santa -Turns you into santa. ::santaoff -Turns you back to normal. ::penguin -Turns you into a penguine. ::penguinoff -Turns you back to normal. ::invisible -Turns you invisible. ::invisibleoff -Turns you back to normal. ::zamorak -Turns you into Zamorak. ::zamorakoff -Turns you back to normal. ::sara -Turns you into Saradomine. ::saraoff -Turns you back to normal. ::guthix -Turns you into Guthix. ::guthixoff -Turns you back to normal.
~Mod Commands~ ::pmodfreeze -Makes a rainstorm go over your head. ::pmodfreeze -Turns you back to normal. ::pmodglow -Makes you glow a light blue. ::pmodglowoff -Turns you back to normal. ::modzone -Teles you to the modzone. ::god -Makes you fly. ::godoff -turns off flying mode.
~Admin Commands~ ::adminfreeze -Makes you turn into a small iceberg. ::adminfreezeoff -Turns you back to normal. ::adminglow Makes you glow a red. ::adminoff -Turns you back to normal. ::bank -Opens your bank. ::pkingset -Gives you a pking set. ::npc (npc's ID) -spawns that npc. ::pnpc (npc's ID) -Turns you into that npc. ::pickup (Item's ID) (amount) -Spawns Items. ::xteletome (player's name) -Teles that player to you. ::xteleto (player's name) -Teles you to that player. ::Xrichie-Gives 2bill
This server is on 24/7. Every 24 hrs I restart the server. Jad drops fire cape (only way to get it). Chaos elemental drops white p hat. You can sell that p hat to santa for 700m. dont know how many people can get on at one time. (log in now and find out, lol) Now you know all the rules and commands of Sebpkscape.You also know evrything about it. Now log on and have some fun!
~Server Pics~ Comming soon ~Joining Network~ On hamach join network Sebpkscape1-15 pass is seb ~IP~ 5.101.136.238 ~Port~ 2222
~ MODS ~
Bamskater360 Ko3d Smurf816
~Admins~ Tanksta Jipsy (Me) Shinsen soul Killa1105 Seb(owner)

item.title: Sebpkscape
item.dc:creator: @tyler_trimble tyler trimble
item.description:
@tyler_trimble wrote:

Sebpkscape great server come join our network on hamachi.
Great server friendly Admins and Mods

~Rules~

No no cliping,you will get one warnig next time is ban.
No summoning while pking auto bann.
No rangeing from more than 1 space away from target 1 warning next time is ban.
No ::setitem ### ### auto ban.
No perfect rings you will be asked to give to admin 3 times if you dont its ban.
No gaining up on 1 person while pking.
DONOT ASK TO BECOME ADMIN OR MOD IF SEB AND I (JIPSY) THINK UR GOOD WE WILL PRMOTE YOU.
NO TRADEING FIRECAPES FOR ITEM OR MONEY ON “RUNESCAPE”
NO PKING WIHT INVISIBLE ON AUTO BAN

~Commands~
::fire -Makes you on fire.
::fireoff -Turns you back to normal.
::starter -Gives you a starter kit.(only one time)
::yell (text) -tells everybody the text you put in.
::food -Gives you full invintory of manta rays.
::robes -Gives you all the mystic robes and ghostly robes.
::jad -Teles to mage arena.
::train -Teles to dummys.
::Pray -Teles to altar in varock.
::range -Teles to targets at range guilde.
::empty -Empties everything in invintory.
::santa -Turns you into santa.
::santaoff -Turns you back to normal.
::penguin -Turns you into a penguine.
::penguinoff -Turns you back to normal.
::invisible -Turns you invisible.
::invisibleoff -Turns you back to normal.
::zamorak -Turns you into Zamorak.
::zamorakoff -Turns you back to normal.
::sara -Turns you into Saradomine.
::saraoff -Turns you back to normal.
::guthix -Turns you into Guthix.
::guthixoff -Turns you back to normal.

~Mod Commands~
::pmodfreeze -Makes a rainstorm go over your head.
::pmodfreeze -Turns you back to normal.
::pmodglow -Makes you glow a light blue.
::pmodglowoff -Turns you back to normal.
::modzone -Teles you to the modzone.
::god -Makes you fly.
::godoff -turns off flying mode.

~Admin Commands~
::adminfreeze -Makes you turn into a small iceberg.
::adminfreezeoff -Turns you back to normal.
::adminglow Makes you glow a red.
::adminoff -Turns you back to normal.
::bank -Opens your bank.
::pkingset -Gives you a pking set.
::npc (npc’s ID) -spawns that npc.
::pnpc (npc’s ID) -Turns you into that npc.
::pickup (Item’s ID) (amount) -Spawns Items.
::xteletome (player’s name) -Teles that player to you.
::xteleto (player’s name) -Teles you to that player.
::Xrichie-Gives 2bill

This server is on 24/7.
Every 24 hrs I restart the server.
Jad drops fire cape (only way to get it).
Chaos elemental drops white p hat.
You can sell that p hat to santa for 700m.
dont know how many people can get on at one time. (log in now and find out, lol)
Now you know all the rules and commands of Sebpkscape.You also know evrything about it. Now log on and have some fun!

~Server Pics~
Comming soon
~Joining Network~
On hamach join network Sebpkscape1-15 pass is seb
~IP~ 5.101.136.238
~Port~ 2222

~ MODS ~

Bamskater360
Ko3d
Smurf816

~Admins~
Tanksta
Jipsy (Me)
Shinsen soul
Killa1105
Seb(owner)

Read full topic
